channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0197; 04:45AM; 8304 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lq1yQF; #Florence; Firefighters found an approximately 25' x 75' one-story commercial building with heavy fire showing. It took 32 firefighters 21 min to extinguish the flames, sparing the nearby apartment from any damage. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 E64 RA33 RA833 RA857 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0197; 04:24AM; 8304 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Lq1yQF; #Florence; One-story commercial building with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 E64 RA33 RA833 RA857 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0536; 09:59AM; 11144 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LMXQlk; #GranadaHills; Firefighters found a one-story row of commercials with smoke showing. Firefighter made entry and found one unit (operating as a restaurant), with fire inside. It took the first 28 firefighters 19 minutes (10:18am) to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 E105 E227 E27 E275 E288 E290 E293 E298 E70 E75 E8 E87 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA75 T27 T75 T88 T90 T93 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0270; 06:42AM; 2000 N Stadium Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oS8MFk; #ElysianPark; Firefighters arrived to find wires down into a vacant (boarded up) one-story bungalow, with heavy fire showing (and threatening trees). Thirty-four firefighters successfully protected the exterior vegetation and extinguished the flames in 18 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E20 E203 E220 E3 E4 FR201 RA20 RA4 SQ21 T20 T3; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0270; 06:24AM; 2000 N Stadium Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oS8MFk; #ElysianPark; One-story vacant single-family home with heavy fire showing. Flames are threatening nearby trees on the exterior. No other structures threatened.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E20 E220 E3 FR201 RA20 SQ21 T20; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Civilian Fatality Vehicle Fire; INC#1617; 08:49PM; 12640 W Riverside Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/41VxO55; #ValleyVillage; PRELIM: LAFD crews arrived to find a vehicle fire to the rear of a vacant two story commercial building. As they quickly extinguished the burning sedan without damage to the structure, they discovered the burned remains of an adult male adjacent to the vehicle. No other injuries were reported. The fire cause is under active investigation. Media Inquiries: LAPD (Incident #4431) and Coroner.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E278 T78 RA78 E102 E60 BC14 T60 E260 RA878 PH1; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Multi-Patient Medical; INC#0728; 12:20PM; 4066 Johnnie Cochran Vista; MAP: https://bit.ly/3njw5HU; #ArlingtonHeights; Three "school age" children (unconfirmed ages/genders or site affiliation) at Johnnie L. Cochran Jr. Middle School, were initially reported as having altered levels of consciousness following their possible exposure to or ingestion of a still unidentified substance. Following treatment by school staff and LAFD Paramedics, all three have been transported to an area hospital by ambulance, where they arrived conscious and breathing in minor to moderate medical distress. LAFD responders discovered no specific on-site hazard, and none of the many others on campus presented with any manner of medical complaint. Media Inquiries: LAUSD, LA School Police, LAPD Wilshire Division (Incident #1820 *and/or* #1920).; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E20 EM11 EM18 JT2 JT4 RA29 RA61 RA68 RA826 RA94; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Medical; INC#0728; 11:33AM; 4066 Johnnie Cochran Vista; MAP: https://bit.ly/3njw5HU; #ArlingtonHeights; PRELIM: At least three children (unconfirmed ages/genders/conditions or site affiliation) at a school, with altered level of consciousness after possible exposure or ingestion of a yet unknown substance. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAUSD, LA School Police, LAPD Wilshire Division (Incident #1820 and/or #1920).; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; C11 E20 EM11 EM18 JT2 JT4 RA29 RA61 RA68 RA826 RA94; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

Injury; INC#0531; 09:37AM; LAX Airport - 240 S West Way; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LmkArc; #Westchester; PRELIM: A 24 year-old male (construction?) worker (unknown craft) sustained a non-life threatening left ankle injury at an elevated worksite with limited access. LAFD personnel will be using an aerial ladder in a crane-like fashion to lower the non-ambulatory man to ground level in a basket stretcher, so that he can be taken by LAFD ambulance to an area hospital.; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E205 E295 E5 E51 EM4 HR3 RA51 RA827 RA867 RA88 T5 T95 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Train Derailment; INC#0392; 08:03AM; 14351 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NsJMih; #GranadaHills; PRELIM: One or more freight railroad car(s) derailed and overturned. Undetermined cargo. No spill reported. No fire. No injury. No need for LAFD services. Media Inquiries: Union Pacific Railroad for freight train issues, and Metrolink for any service impact on their shared Antelope Valley line. ; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E18; CH8; Brian Humphrey
